string.description: Typesense API URL. Alternatively, can be configured using the `TYPESENSE_URL` environment variable. Alternatively alternatively, can be configured using the `TYPESENSE_PROTOCOL`, `TYPESENSE_HOST` and `TYPESENSE_PORT` environment variables.
Typesense Admin API Key. Alternatively, can be configured using the `TYPESENSE_API_KEY` environment variable.
